description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Life and Finding of Dr. Livingstone. Containing the original Letters written by H. M. Stanley, to the “New York Herald.” [With letters and dispatches of D. Livingstone.] New and enlarged edition, with an account of Dr. Livingstone's death and latest discoveries. Portraits and ... illustrations", "Appendix" Author: Livingstone, David Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 4955.de.10.", "British Library HMNTS 10097.de.1." Page: 147 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1874 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002202125 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life.
